mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (TITLE, DETAILS, TYPE, USERNAME, PHONE, PROVINCE, CITY, DATE )VALUES ( #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{details,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_DATE )
mapper.select: SELECT TITLE AS title, DETAILS AS details, TYPE AS type, PHONE AS phone, USERNAME AS username, PROVINCE AS province, CITY AS city, date_format(CREATEDATE,'%Y-%d-%m' )AS createdate FROM question
